subject: Mathematics
title: Introduction to Quantum Computing
description: Quantum computing can be considered a super set of classical computer.  It is a new way of computing that uses quantum-mechanical phenomena, such as superposition and entanglement, to perform operations on data. This set of notes aims to introduce the mathematical model for quantum computing.
objectives: Understand the basic principles of quantum computing
Understand the mathematical model for quantum computing
Understand the concept of quantum entanglement
Understand the concept of quantum superposition
